title: MuzzleFlash VFX Pack
description: Pack includes 25 stylized muzzle flashes fully ready for your projects
longDescription:
This package includes 25 stylized muzzle flashes fully ready for your projects

Showcase video 1: https://youtu.be/VizolBRZ9DQ

Showcase video 2: https://youtu.be/c3iksl2EsGk

Tutorial video: https://youtu.be/QzBvaKwqdSE


Inside the package you will find:

- 25 Muzzle flash effects

- You can easily customize the effects to your liking with the particle system settings or your own textures

- 25 main Textures, plus additional textures for sparks, glow and noise


Please check the tutorial video (3rd :) ) which goes over some of the main settings for these Muzzle flash effects.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  This pack includes 10 Muzzle Flash Effects created in the Unreal Engine Niagara Particle System.
  •  Customizable materials for each effect

Type of Emitters: CPU, GPU

Number of Unique Effects: 25

LODs: No

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 81

Number of Textures: 36

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Tutorial video: https://youtu.be/QzBvaKwqdSE
